BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.traffic.engine.TrafficEngine.dispatch(QueryContext, boolean) uses iterator().next() on a List to get the first item
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.traffic.exception.metadata.EmptyTrafficExecutionUnitException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
org.apache.shardingsphere.traffic.executor.TrafficExecutor.setParameters(Statement, List): 2nd parameter 'params' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.traffic.rule.TrafficRule.match(TrafficAlgorithm, QueryContext, boolean) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
This method org.apache.shardingsphere.traffic.rule.TrafficRule.createTrafficAlgorithms(Map) uses a concatenated String as a map key
This method org.apache.shardingsphere.traffic.rule.TrafficRule.createTrafficLoadBalanceAlgorithms(Map) uses a concatenated String as a map key
